channel.title: Daily News
channel.description: 毎日更新のニュースサマリー

item.description: OpenAI’s planned \$3 billion acquisition of AI-coding startup **Windsurf** collapsed. Google DeepMind instead hired Windsurf’s CEO Varun Mohan, co-founder Douglas Chen, and key researchers, obtaining ...

OpenAI is preparing to release its first **open-weight** language model—described as comparable to the internal “o3 mini”—as early as next week. The weights will be freely downloadable and hostable on...

Open-source LLM-framework startup **LangChain** is reportedly closing a new round led by IVP that would value the company at about **$1 billion**. Founded in 2022, LangChain’s framework lets developer...

Corporate-card provider **Brex** has ditched its months-long vendor-review pipeline so engineers can trial new AI tools immediately, even giving them a monthly budget for experiments. The company crea...

The Independent Publishers Alliance formally complained to the European Commission, alleging that Google’s AI Overviews _“misuse web content”_ and cause significant traffic and revenue losses for news...
